## Text Editor field

This field type can be used to create a text area, a TinyMCE editor (WP editor) with basic controls or advanced controls

## General options

- Field name
- Field key
- Placeholder (If Textarea mode is selected)
- Description
- Is Required
- CSS Classes
- Default value

## Specific options

- **Suffix:** Adds a suffix element over the input
- **Minlength:** Minimum number of characters
- **Maxlength:** Maxium number of characters
- **Editor type:** Textarea, WP editor Basic Controls, WP editor Advanced Controls
